attributes.action: immediate deportation of  all illegal immigrants with a criminal record.
attributes.additional_details: As a eligible uk voter I am withholding my vote at all elections until the government get a firm grip on the problem of illegal immigrants with a criminal record and deport them from this country and preventing their re-entry back into this country, also this country must actively seek out illegal immigrants and also deport them in a rapid manner also preventing them from re-entry into this country.
